query:
-- Update Day 2 tourist sites (Sep 2, 2026)
UPDATE tourist_sites 
SET plannedVisitDate = 1788307200000, updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE tripId = 30001 AND plannedVisitDate = 1725224400000;

-- Update Day 2 restaurants (Sep 2, 2026)
UPDATE restaurants 
SET reservationDate = 1788307200000, updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE tripId = 30001 AND reservationDate = 1725224400000;

-- Update Day 6 tourist sites (Sep 6, 2026)
UPDATE tourist_sites 
SET plannedVisitDate = 1788652800000, updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE tripId = 30001 AND plannedVisitDate = 1725613200000;

-- Update Day 6 restaurants (Sep 6, 2026)
UPDATE restaurants 
SET reservationDate = 1788652800000, updatedAt = NOW()
WHERE tripId = 30001 AND reservationDate = 1725613200000;
